text: Rachel Weinberg is a French film director, screenwriter and actress, born on 25 October 1929 in Roanne, Loire. == Filmography == ;Director *1971 : Pic et pic et colegram with Monique Chaumette, Jean-Paul Tribout and Henri Garcin *1974 : L'Ampélopède with Isabelle Huppert and Jean Pignol ; (also screenwriter) *1981 : La Flambeuse with Lea Massari, Laurent Terzieff, Didier Sauvegrain, Claude Brosset and Gérard Blain ; (also screenwriter) ;Actress *1973 : Monsieur Émilien est mort, telefilm directed by Jean Pignol with Jean- Roger Caussimon, Françoise Seigner and Roger Souza == External links == * Category:French film directors Category:French screenwriters Category:French television actresses Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:French women film directors Category:French women screenwriters Category:People from Roanne
title: Rachel Weinberg
